result.eng: He was rubbing his hands together.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéile
result.orig: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéile
result.html: Bhí sé ag cuimilt a dhá lámh dá chéileHe was rubbing his hands together.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag cuimilt a ḋá láṁ dá ċéileHe was rubbing his hands together.

result.eng: We worked together to fix the problem.
result.ga: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.orig: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteach
result.html: Bhí muid ag obair as lámha a chéile chun an fhadhb a réiteachWe worked together to fix the problem.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid ag obair as láṁa a ċéile ċun an ḟaḋb a réiteaċWe worked together to fix the problem.

result.eng: We were in the same class together.
result.ga: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.orig: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.html: Bhí muid in aon rang le chéileWe were in the same class together.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí muid in aon rang le ċéileWe were in the same class together.

result.ga: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéile
result.orig: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéile
result.html: Chaith muid an samhradh le chéileWe spent the summer together.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ muid an saṁraḋ le ċéileWe spent the summer together.

result.ga: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéile
result.orig: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéile
result.html: Réitíonn muid go maith le chéileWe get on well together.
result.ponchtml: Réitíonn muid go maiṫ le ċéileWe get on well together.

result.eng: The country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.
result.ga: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil
result.orig: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháil
result.html: Tháinig aos liteartha na tíre le chéile ag an chomhdháilThe country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig aos litearṫa na tíre le ċéile ag an ċoṁḋáilThe country's inteligentsia came together at the conference.

result.ga: Tá Seán agus mise ag obair le chéile
result.orig: Tá Seán agus mise ag obair le chéile
result.html: Tá Seán agus mise ag obair le chéileSeán and I work together.
result.ponchtml: Tá Seán agus mise ag obair le ċéileSeán and I work together.

result.eng: What time will we meet together?
result.ga: Cén t-am a chasfas muid le chéile
result.orig: Cén t-am a chasfas muid le chéile
result.html: Cén t-am a chasfas muid le chéileWhat time will we meet together?
result.ponchtml: Cén t-am a ċasfas muid le ċéileWhat time will we meet together?

result.eng: Myself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ga: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche Aoine
result.orig: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche Aoine
result.html: Téim féin agus mo bhean chéile amach fá choinne béile achan oíche AoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.
result.ponchtml: Téim féin agus mo ḃean ċéile amaċ fá ċoinne béile aċan oíċe AoineMyself and my wife go out together for a meal every Friday night.

result.ga: An dtéann sibh ansin le chéile
result.orig: An dtéann sibh ansin le chéile
result.html: An dtéann sibh ansin le chéileDo you go there together?
result.ponchtml: An dtéann siḃ ansin le ċéileDo you go there together?

result.html: Táimid an-sona le chéileWe're very happy together.
result.ponchtml: Táimid an-sona le ċéileWe're very happy together.
